ml:Event.ml:title: Learn about MarkLogic in the Cloud at the next Denver MarkLogic User Group (DenMARK)

p.ml:teaser: Denise Miura, Sr. Director of Product Management will be speaking about MarkLogic's new offering for the Cloud at our upcoming User Group in Denver.

ml:description.p: In this presentation, Denise will explain MarkLogic's new cloud deployment options and describe how they are being used today within the MarkLogic development community. She will demonstrate instantuating a MarkLogic AMI live on Amazon EC2 and talk about best practices for using MarkLogic on the EC2 platform. Finally a preview of the planned cloud-related product enhancements will be provided. This is a great opportunity to provide feedback and influence the cloud computing initiative at MarkLogic.

ml:details.ml:location: Auriria Campus, Tivoli Bldg (900 Walnut st. Denver, CO) Rm 320 Section B, Baerresen Ballroom
